General.Name: Maha Energy AB A
General.Description: Maha Energy AB (publ) engages in the exploration, development, and production of crude oil and natural gas in Brazil, the United States, and Oman. It owns 65% working interest in the Block 70 (Mafraq) project covering an area of 157,900 acres in Oman; and 97% working interest in the Illinois Basin property that covers an area of 3,134 acres located in Illinois, the United States. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.
